questions.text: What percentage of the Earth's surface is covered by oceans?

feedback.correct: Correct! About 70% of the Earth's surface is covered by oceans.
feedback.incorrect: Not quite. The correct answer is 70%.

questions.text: Which ocean is the largest by surface area?

feedback.correct: Well done! The Pacific Ocean is the largest, covering more than 63 million square miles.
feedback.incorrect: The correct answer is the Pacific Ocean.
